title: Pointe Smart & New Light Technology Group Announce Merger
text:
DALLAS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Pointe Smart & New Light Technology Group are excited to announce a definitive agreement to merge the two companies has been executed and approved by their respective Boards. The merger is effective immediately, and the two companies will be working together closely over the course of the next six months to bring the organizations together as one combined team.
Pointe Smart & New Light fully expect the merger of the two organizations to increase customer confidence, gain market share and significantly expand their capabilities across the business technology value chain. By bringing the two organizations together, Pointe Smart & New Light will be shifting to a pure play information technology consulting firm that gives their customers the ability to tap into strategic and technology-driven services.
“New Light’s talent and expertise associated with strategic information technology consulting integrates a critical service offering into our organization that will strengthen our customer relationships and expands our influence,” said David Clark, President, Pointe Smart.
“The digital revolution is changing the entire business landscape and reinventing how organizations sell, operate and service. Our clients live in a world today in which technology intersects their business from numerous angles and perspectives. Pointe Smart’s technical proficiency and capabilities add a dimension to our service offering that will be welcomed by our clients,” said Kevin Wheat, Partner, New Light Technology Group.
About Pointe Smart
Pointe Smart is a technology organization focusing on cloud, application development, and business intelligence. It specializes in providing value-added technology solutions solving a wide range of business challenges. Pointe Smart is headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
http://www.pointesmart.com/
About New Light Technology Group
New Light is an information technology consulting organization. It specializes in providing advisory services with a focus business technology challenges. New Light is headquartered in Dallas, Texas and has offices in San Jose, CA, Alexandria, Virginia and Bangalore, India.
http://gonewlight.com/
